name: Help Me
description:
A one of a kind horrific choose your own adventure game!


Help Me is a unique choose your own adventure game. You need to get out of the house but can you do it?

A game for any spooky night.

Features:

    - Created by Wallace Lovecraft!
    - Music by wonderful people!
    - Original handcrafted hand drawn art.
    - In 1920x1200 HD glory!
    - Multiple endings!
    - Every death has it’s own unique story and art!!!
    - This is a very short game that should take approximately 7 - 10+ minutes to beat but the memories gained will last a lifetime!
